statements: DELETE FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE customer_id = 123 AND interaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM customer_sentiment_tracking WHERE customer_id = 101 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM social_media_interactions WHERE interaction_id = 100 AND customer_id = 5;
DELETE FROM SatisfactionLevels WHERE satisfaction_score < 5.0 AND survey_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM CustomerInteractions WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerSentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5);
DELETE FROM sentiments_analysis WHERE customer_id = 100 AND analysis_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_sentiments WHERE customer_id = 123 AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date < '2022-01-01' AND customer_id = 456;
